text_for_embedding:
Section 2: Usage Guide
Feature: Document Parsing; Description: Parses .doc and .docx files; Status: Supported
Feature: Text Embedding; Description: Converts text to vectors; Status: Supported
Feature: FAISS Indexing; Description: Creates vector search index; Status: Supported
excerpt_markdown:
| Feature | Description | Status |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Document Parsing | Parses .doc and .docx files | Supported |
| Text Embedding | Converts text to vectors | Supported |
| FAISS Indexing | Creates vector search index | Supported |

text_for_embedding:
Conclusion
The Knowledge Base Builder is a powerful tool for creating searchable knowledge bases from Word documents. Use it to organize and retrieve information efficiently.
excerpt_markdown: The Knowledge Base Builder is a powerful tool for creating searchable knowledge bases from Word documents. Use it to organize and retrieve information efficiently.
